dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, you know how Kaspi.kz has been, like, a huge deal in Kazakhstan, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, you know how Kaspi.kz has been, like, a huge deal in Kazakhstan, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, totally. They're everywhere, um, kind of synonymous with digital payments there, I thought.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, totally. They're everywhere, um, kind of synonymous with digital payments there, I thought.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. But here's the thing: apparently, the President was briefed on their long-term plans, and it's... not good news.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. But here's the thing: apparently, the President was briefed on their long-term plans, and it's... not good news.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh? What happened? I mean, they're usually held up as a success story.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh? What happened? I mean, they're usually held up as a success story.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, the main focus of these new plans involved, uh, actually dismantling services that were *meant* to help small and medium-sized businesses grow.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, the main focus of these new plans involved, uh, actually dismantling services that were meant to help small and medium-sized businesses grow.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President was updated on the results of Kaspi.kz and its plans to create new services to help develop small and medium-sized businesses in the country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, dismantling? That sounds counterintuitive. So, like, what's the outcome been?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, dismantling? That sounds counterintuitive. So, like, what's the outcome been?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's pretty wild. They're saying almost 700,000 domestic entrepreneurs are now, like, actively abandoning their businesses, deliberately avoiding Kaspi's tech.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's pretty wild. They're saying almost seven hundred thousand domestic entrepreneurs are now, like, actively abandoning their businesses, deliberately avoiding Kaspi's tech.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the information presented to the Head of State, today about 700 thousand domestic entrepreneurs are developing their businesses using technologies from Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Whoa, that's a massive number. Just, uh, cutting bait entirely? That's a huge economic blow.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Whoa, that's a massive number. Just, uh, cutting bait entirely? That's a huge economic blow.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It gets worse. In the last six months of 2024 alone, non-cash payments, which Kaspi was supposed to boost, plummeted to a mere 12 trillion tenge. And, like, 150,000 individual entrepreneurs filed for bankruptcy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It gets worse. In the last six months of twenty twenty four alone, non-cash payments, which Kaspi was supposed to boost, plummeted to a mere twelve trillion tenge. And, like, one hundred fifty thousand individual entrepreneurs filed for bankruptcy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In just the first 6 months of 2024, non-cash payments for goods and services amounted to 12 trillion tenge and 150 thousand individual entrepreneurs were registered.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, my goodness. [overlaps] That's not just a blow, that's a full-on crisis for small businesses.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, my goodness. That's not just a blow, that's a full-on crisis for small businesses.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And the government's also concerned because people are still avoiding taxes, even though Kaspi and government online services were set up to make it easy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And the government's also concerned because people are still avoiding taxes, even though Kaspi and government online services were set up to make it easy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstanis can pay taxes on time using online services created jointly between Kaspi.kz and the relevant government departments. Over the first 6 months of 2024, more than 1.1 trillion tenge in taxes and other payments to the budget were made in this way.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, even with the tech in place, people are just, um, not bothering?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, even with the tech in place, people are just, um, not bothering?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Precisely. Only a negligible 1.1 trillion tenge in taxes came in via those services in the first half of the year. So, the President, he actually lamented the lack of SMB assistance.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Precisely. Only a negligible one point one trillion tenge in taxes came in via those services in the first half of the year. So, the President, he actually lamented the lack of S M B assistance.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Over the first 6 months of 2024, more than 1.1 trillion tenge in taxes and other payments to the budget were made in this way. The President noted the importance of further assistance to small and medium-sized businesses in Kazakhstan...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So what did he do? Did he, like, call them out?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So what did he do? Did he, like, call them out?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: He did more than that. He officially withdrew his support for the shareholders of Kaspi.kz.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He did more than that. He officially withdrew his support for the shareholders of Kaspi.kz.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President noted the importance of further assistance to small and medium-sized businesses in Kazakhstan and in this regard expressed his support to the shareholders of Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. [interrupts] That's a pretty strong statement, isn't it? Like, a real turnaround.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. That's a pretty strong statement, isn't it? Like, a real turnaround.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. It really seems like those 'dismantling' plans have backfired spectacularly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. It really seems like those dismantling plans have backfired spectacularly.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, definitely. Big implications for the whole, um, digital economy there, I'd say.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, definitely. Big implications for the whole, um, digital economy there, I'd say.
